Dream journal

A log of night narratives
  • 2023-04-04: can’t remember
  • 2023-04-03: dreamed I was Beanie Feldstein in “Impeachment” and the sex with Bill was super hot. Then I was in the Algarve flying over the lavender-colored valleys, then two gay men were showing me their new apartment, and one of the guys’ ex was also there laughing about how they’d have to raise their kid in a one-bedroom.
